eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following areas: Jefferson Davis, LA; at 01:58 PM ON DEC 12, 2025 Effective until 01:58 PM DEC 13, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
WATER HAS BEEN RESTORED. A BOIL ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT. CITY OFFICIALS WILL KEEP THIS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW. MORE INFORMATION WILL FOLLOW BOIL ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT. BOTTLE WATER IS SUGGESTED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.\
BOIL YOUR WATER BEFORE USING. THE CITY OF JENNINGS WATER SYSTEM HAD A WATER LINE BREAK. THIS BREAK HAS BEEN REPAIRED. THE WATER SYSTEM IS BACK UP. IT IS SUGGESTED TO BOIL WATER BEFORE USING. THIS BOIL ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.  

THE OFFICE OF EMERGENCY PREPAREDNESS WILL UPDATE THIS INFORMATION THROUGH THIS PUBLIC NOTIFICTION SYSTEM AS SOON AS WE GET THE INFORMATION FROM CITY OFFICIALS.  
DOWNLOAD OUR APP TO CONTINUE TO MONITOR THE SITUATION
